name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
AI Full-stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and finance. Expert in **React.js**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **RESTful APIs**, demonstrating strong capabilities in both frontend and backend development. Proficient in AI/ML integration, leveraging cloud deployment strategies using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Experienced in deploying containerized applications with **Docker** and implementing robust development practices within Agile methodology.
Successfully built AI/ML-powered platforms to drive predictive analytics and automation, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Adept at conducting code reviews and maintaining clear communication within teams, fostering a collaborative work environment.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and maintained full-stack applications utilizing **React.js**, **Node.js**, and **Python (FastAPI)**, ensuring seamless interaction between frontend and backend components.
- Implemented **RESTful APIs** and integrated **AI/ML** functionalities into applications, enhancing user experience and operational efficiency in line with business objectives.
- Deployed solutions using **Docker**, **AWS**, and **Azure**, achieving high availability and scalability while adhering to cloud deployment strategies.
- Conducted thorough code reviews and collaborated in an **Agile methodology** environment to refine software development processes and ensure quality deliverables.
- Designed and executed data pipelines and infrastructures employing databases such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB, effectively handling data ingestion and real-time analytics for applications.
- Collaborated closely with data science teams to integrate **AI/ML** models into production systems using **Flask** and **Django**, enhancing functionality through features like predictive analytics and intelligent recommendations.
- Created CI/CD workflows in **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, optimizing deployment processes and enabling quick iterations for application updates.
- Implemented security measures and followed compliance standards including GDPR and HIPAA in all aspects of system development, particularly in **web services** and data management.
- Achieved a **30%** reduction in deployment times through the automation of testing and integration processes, consistently delivering robust and reliable applications.
- Enhanced application performance by **optimizing** algorithms and utilizing data visualization libraries such as D3.js for insightful analytics, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions.
- Fostered clearer communication within teams, ensuring uniform understanding of project requirements and alignment with business goals, leading to a smoother project lifecycle.

Utilized **React.js** to build interactive and responsive front-end applications, incorporating **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for enhanced user experience in financial tools and admin panels.
Developed server-side applications using **Node.js** with **NestJS** and **Express**, as well as **Python** technologies like **FastAPI** and **Django**, implementing **RESTful APIs** to improve scalability and performance for systems handling over **10,000 transactions** per hour.
Engaged in cloud deployment strategies using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, optimizing deployment processes by integrating **Docker** for containerization, which reduced deployment times by **30%**.
Created and maintained event-driven architectures utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring reliable asynchronous communication across workflows essential for financial compliance and real-time alerts.
Designed ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting and processing financial data, handling both batch and real-time data with an on-time delivery rate of **95%**.
Implemented machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, contributing to a **15%** reduction in fraudulent transactions through proactive detection based on user behavior patterns.
Constructed ML pipelines for real-time projects such as credit scoring and churn prediction, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** to seamlessly integrate model inference into existing backend services, increasing overall operational efficiency by **20%**.
Conducted peer code reviews and participated in an **Agile methodology** environment, fostering clear communication and collaborative efforts to enhance team productivity and project delivery.

• Developed and maintained scalable and high-performing backend services using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), ensuring optimal responsiveness for over **1 million** monthly users.
• Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and web services, effectively enhancing system integrations and supporting real-time data flow for e-commerce applications.
• Integrated AI/ML solutions using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize user experiences and drive conversions, leading to a **15%** increase in sales through targeted recommendations.
• Created responsive user interfaces with **React.js**, ensuring seamless experiences across different devices and achieving a **98%** mobile responsiveness score in user testing.
• Leveraged cloud deployment strategies using **AWS** and **Azure**, optimizing backend services for **99.9% uptime** by utilizing effective deployment and scaling techniques.
• Employed containerization with **Docker** to standardize development environments, enhancing team collaboration and reducing onboarding time by **40%**.
• Conducted thorough code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and professional development.
• Participated in Agile methodology for project management, delivering features and updates in **2-week** sprint cycles, maintaining clear communication with cross-functional teams.
• Managed data storage solutions using databases like **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, achieving improved data retrieval times and fault tolerance for high-traffic scenarios.
• Championed mobile-first design principles while developing SEO-friendly e-commerce UI components, following accessibility compliance standards (WCAG 2.1).
• Implemented robust security measures, including role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring compliance with GDPR and maintaining customer data integrity.
